name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess advanced skills in **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, and UI/UX design, along with proficiency in modern frameworks such as **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber**. My expertise extends to implementing animations and enhancing user experiences using **Tailwind** and **Radix UI**. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with testing frameworks like **Vitest**, **Cypress**, and **Playwright**, ensuring high-quality deliverables through continuous integration.

My background includes building high-performance applications integrating AI technologies from **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, and **LangChain** for innovative solutions. I have developed a keen understanding of REST and GraphQL APIs along with real-time data processing using **WebSocket**. I am also proficient in backend technologies like **Node.js** and **Python**, and have utilized **Docker** for containerization, ensuring seamless deployment workflows.

With a solid track record in the healthcare and financial sectors, I possess a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. My experience in innovative development frameworks and tools allows me to contribute effectively to enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI and machine learning capabilities.
